wasSureItWasHere.description: Player chose the confident option (“It’s here.”).

wasUnsureItWasHere.description: Player chose the hesitant option (“It’s… here?”).

foundOldShoe.description: Set when the node gives the player the old_shoe inventory item.

readShoppingList.description: Set when the shopping_list_home note is added/read.

knowsAgnesName.description: Player has learned Agnes's real name.
